column1: Main last departure airports and airlines to Sri Lanka
An  analysis  of  the  last  departure  airports  to  Sri  Lanka  reveals  the  vital  importance  of  air
connectivity  in  the  tourism  industry.  As  depicted  in  the  below  Chart  4,  for  around  50%  of
tourists the last airports had been Dubai, Doha and Chennai,. Further, in terms of airlines, Sri
Lankan Airlines, Qatar Airways and Emirates were the top airlines, handling 57% of tourists
Chart 4. Main last departure airports to Sri Lanka, January 2022
